longBusinessSummary: River Valley Community Bancorp, through its subsidiary, River Valley Community Bank provides various banking products and services in the United States. The company accepts personal and business checking accounts; savings accounts; certificates of deposit; and IRA accounts. Its loan products include consumer term, agricultural real estate and land development, and construction loans, as well as SBA 504; home equity lines of credit; commercial lines of credit; and agricultural operating loans and lines. The company also offers debit, credit, money, and gift cards; and online banking and bill payment, ACH origination, text message banking, electronic statements, remote deposit capture, merchant card processing, payroll, cheques, automatic teller machine, drive-up teller window, safe deposit box, notary, night depository, overdraft protection, bank by mail, direct deposit, wire transfer, and mobile banking services. It primarily serves small to middle-market businesses and professionals. River Valley Community Bancorp was founded in 2006 and is headquartered in Yuba City, California.

companyOfficers.name: Ms. Charissa  McClain
companyOfficers.title: Senior VP, Compliance Officer, CRA Officer & BSA Officer
